meanings.definition: The quality or state of being posthumous.
meanings.sent1: The posthumousness of the letter made everyone emotional.
meanings.sent2: The posthumousness of the award ceremony honored the late actor.
meanings.sent3: The posthumousness of the surprise party was a touching tribute.
meanings.sent4: The posthumousness of the painting captured the artist's essence beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The posthumousness of the book release brought closure to the author's fans.

meanings.definition: The condition of occurring or being published after the death of the author.
meanings.sent1: The posthumousness of the novel added to its mystique.
meanings.sent2: The posthumousness of the poem collection was a bittersweet discovery.
meanings.sent3: The posthumousness of the cookbook made it a collector's item.
meanings.sent4: The posthumousness of the biography shed light on the author's life.
meanings.sent5: The posthumousness of the music album was a final gift to the fans.
